Name: Paiania Center
Description: The heart of Paiania, featuring local markets, cultural landmarks, and a mix of residential and commercial areas.

Name: Glyka Nera
Description: A growing suburban district known for its green spaces, modern housing, and accessibility to Athens.

Name: Kantza
Description: A semi-rural district famous for its vineyards, wineries, and open landscapes, offering a peaceful living environment.
